There are the following approaches to update nested state properties in ReactJS: Approach 1: We can create a dummy object to perform operations on it (update properties that we want) then replace the componentâ€™s state with the updated object. Approach 2: We can pass the old nested object using the spread operator and then override the particular properties of the nested object.
